meanings.sent1: The puppy was so spirted, always running around with excitement.
meanings.sent2: She gave a spirted performance on stage, captivating the audience with her energy.
meanings.sent3: The spirted squirrel kept darting around the park, entertaining the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her spirted laughter echoed through the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The spirted colors of the painting brought it to life, making it vibrant and dynamic.

meanings.definition: Having a strong character or determination
meanings.sent1: Despite his small size, the spirted boy stood up to the bully bravely.
meanings.sent2: The spirted leader inspired her team with her unwavering determination.
meanings.sent3: The spirted old man refused to give up on his dream of climbing the mountain.
meanings.sent4: Her spirted defense in the debate left everyone impressed by her strength.
meanings.sent5: The spirted warrior faced the enemy with courage and resolve, ready for any challenge.
